title: Titan submersible’s scientific director says the submarine malfunctioned just prior to the Titanic dive
content: OceanGate submersible implodes en route to Titanic site, raising questions about company operations and safety practices
date: September 20, 2024 07:30 am IST - September 20, 2024 07:30 am IST

title: Delhi-NCR to witness rain till early October due to delayed monsoon withdrawal
content: This forecast comes as the national capital exceeded both its annual and seasonal average rainfall in early September, with total rainfall crossing the 1,000 mm mark.

title: Donald Trump's call to revoke ABC licence over September 10 debate rejected
content: The Republican presidential candidate had demanded that ABC should lose its broadcast licences over the network's moderating during his September 10 presidential debate with Democrat Kamala Harris.

title: Morning Digest | Doctors call off strike after Bengal government lists reforms; MEA dismisses report about Indian ammunition entering Ukraine, and more
content: Here is a select list of stories to start the day

title: Taiwan questions head of pager firm linked to Hezbollah blasts
content: Taiwan-based Gold Apollo's president and founder Hsu Ching-kuang has said it did not manufacture the devices used in the attack, and that they were made by a Budapest-based company BAC which has a licence to use its brand
date: September 20, 2024 06:43 am IST - TAIPEI- September 20, 2024 06:43 am IST

title: Type 2 drugs could lower dementia, Parkinson's disease risk
content: Some drugs used to treat type 2 diabetes could also help lower a person’s risk of neurodegenerative diseases, such as Alzheimer’s. Image credit: martin-dm/Getty Images.

title: Cadmium exposure may be linked to memory problems in some people
content: New research finds a link between cadmium exposure and memory problems. AerialPerspective Images/Getty Images

title: High-dose ADHD drugs linked to 81% higher psychosis risk, study warns
content: At high doses, prescription amphetamines, used to treat ADHD could increase a person’s risk of psychosis. Image credit: visualspace/Getty Images.

title: Drinking coffee in moderation linked to lower diabetes, heart disease risk
content: Does coffee, consumed in moderation, have a beneficial effect on cardiometabolic health? Image credit: Oleg Breslavtsev/Getty Images.

title: 4 daily servings of cruciferous vegetables may help lower blood pressure
content: Scientists have found that cruciferous vegetables have positive effects on blood pressure. ©Studio One-One/Getty Images

title: New study challenges amyloid-beta theory on cause for Alzheimer's disease
content: New research looks into the role of amyloid-beta in developing Alzheimer’s. Westend61/Getty Images

title: Early-life diet, gluten, some fruits may increase type 1 diabetes risk
content: Eating some foods in early childhood, like gluten-rich cereal, may increase a child’s risk of developing type 1 diabetes. Image credit: rachasuk/Getty Images.

title: Even in obesity, regular exercise turns belly fat healthier
content: Regular endurance exercise can help the body store healthier belly fat. Image credit: Ivo de Bruijn/Stocksy.

title: AFib is 3 times more widespread than doctors thought
content: New research suggests that there may be more than 10.5 million people in the United States living with atrial fibrillation, that is, three times more cases than experts had previously estimated. Image credit: Keith Brofsky/Getty Images.

title: Could time-restricted eating aid blood sugar control, lower type 2 diabetes risk?
content: A small new study suggests that time-restricted eating may bring benefits for blood sugar control. Image credit: Vaidas Bucys/Stocksy.

title: Older adults over age 70 should consider taking statins, study finds
content: Research shows that statins may benefit those over the age of 70, too. BSIP/Getty Images

title: Public speaking anxiety: Essential strategies for student development, leadership
content: Public speaking enhances student development and leadership, but Glossophobia often hinders their potential. With 77% of individuals facing this fear, tackling it within educational settings is essential for their advancement.

title: AIAPGET 2024 counselling round 1 provisional result released. Direct link
content: The AYUSH Admissions Central Counselling Committee (AACCC) has released the provisional seat allotment results for Round 1 of AIAPGET 2024 counselling. Candidates can check their results on the official website and must report to their allotted colleges between September 20 and 25.

title: The evolution of maps: From 500 BC to the modern age
content: The world map we know today owes its shape to the daring exploits of explorers who ventured into uncharted territories, forever pushing the limits of the known world. Intrepid figures like Christopher Columbus and Marco Polo shattered the myths of unreachable lands, offering a new understanding of global geography.

title: IIM CAT 2024 registrations end tomorrow, direct link to apply here
content: The online registration process for the IIM CAT 2024 will conclude tomorrow, September 20. Here is the step-by-step guide to applying for the Common Admission Test (CAT) 2024.

title: UPSC ESE Notification 2024: Registration begins for 232 posts, details here
content: The Union Public Service Commission, UPSC, started the ESE 2025 registration process on September 18, 2024. Candidates applying for Engineering Services Examination 2025 can find the direct link on the UPSC's official website.

title: How to prepare for CAT 2024 with a full-time job or college
content: Balancing CAT preparation with a full-time job or college can be challenging, but it's manageable with the right strategy. Here are some tips to help you prepare effectively:

title: 76 schools in rural Patna shut as Ganga crosses danger mark
content: A total of 76 government schools in eight blocks of Patna district will remain closed till September 21, 2024.

title: Hospitality industry expands with specialised courses catering to niche skills
content: The hospitality industry no longer solely revolves around offering comfortable accommodations and quality dining; it now revolves around curating distinctive, personalised experiences that cater to diverse and evolving consumer preferences.

title: Salvatore ‘Totò’ Schillaci, top scorer of the 1990 FIFA World Cup, dies at 59
content: Overall, he made 16 appearances for the national team during the course of his career. At club level, he represented the likes of Juventus and Italy and went on to score 154 goals from 417 appearances.

title: Alyssa Healy on Australia’s dominion over world cricket: ‘We are being hunted at every opportunity’
content: Healy also conceded that adapting quickly to the demands of a world title defense is what has helped Australia enhance their abilities in the shortest format of the game.

title: Ravichandran Ashwin notches up 6th Test century on India vs Bangladesh Day 1
content: The allrounder took 108 deliveries to reach the milestone, peppering in 10 fours and 2 sixes in the innings as Bangladesh were clueless on how to handle the duo.

title: R Ashwin-Ravindra Jadeja: Check out records duo created with 195-run stand against Bangladesh on Day 1
content: R Ashwin-Ravindra Jadeja: They became the duo with the second-most runs at home in a partnership of 7th wicket or below with Ashwin and Jadeja's 500+ runs in 14 matches just below Kapil Dev and Syed Kirmani's 617 runs in 14 matches.

title: India vs Bangladesh: Key takeaways from Day 1 of 1st IND vs BAN Test
content: With the first innings crippled at 144/6, Ravichandran Ashwin scored his 6th Test century and Ravindra Jadeja remained unbeaten at 86 to close the day's play at 339/6 .

title: Chess Olympiad 2024 Round 8 Live Updates: Arjun Erigaisi, Gukesh, Vidit Gujrathi win; Pragg draws
content: Chess Olympiad 2024 Open Section Round 8 Live Updates: After his heroics against Wei Yi, Gukesh will face Parham Maghsoodloo on the top board while Praggnanandhaa takes on Amin Tabatabaei.

title: India vs Bangladesh: Laid-back pacer Hasan Mahmud, who ran through top order, represents their fast bowling ambitions
content: Singled out by Allan Donald as the best quick to emerge from the country, he snared batting heavyweights but didn't celebrate too much.

title: How R Ashwin, who went to USA to study batting dynamics between baseball and cricket, counterattacked his way in Chennai Test against Bangladesh
content: When Ashwin walked-in in the 43rd over in the post-lunch session – with his family and his friends from Ramakrishnapuram 1st street in attendance – it was going to be a make or break moment for India.

title: Explained: Why are best footballers in the world talking about going on strike
content: With the expanded UEFA Champions League adding at least two more games to an already crammed schedule, and the Club World Cup scheduled next summer after the European season, in theory, Manchester City players may have to turn out for at least 68-70 matches if they reach the finals of all the tournaments that they are part of.

title: Govt may allow more compute capacity based on requirement: IT secretary
content: The rapid development of AI across the globe has led to an increase in demand for GPU-based servers, as they can process data at a higher speed compared to CPU-based servers

title: HCLTech tops TIME's World's Best Companies 2024 list among Indian firms
content: The Noida-headquartered firm has also secured a place in the global top 10 list within the Professional Services category

title: BFSI on hiring sprint, IT sector stumbles in headcount marathon in FY24
content: In comparison, BFSI firms hired 172,000 people on a net basis in 2022-23 (FY23), while IT services companies had a net recruitment of 131,000 employees

title: GCCs in India offer 12-20% higher tech salaries than IT services firms
content: Another 800 GCCs are expected in the next 5-6 years, boosting India's role as a global tech hub, with many in Tier-II cities like Kolkata, Ahmedabad, and Vadodara, promoting local employment

title: Uttar Pradesh govt plans Rs 33.5K crore boost to IT and ITeS hubs
content: A senior UP government official said the state has identified five cities viz. Noida, Lucknow, Kanpur, Varanasi, and Prayagraj (Allahabad) to develop such hubs

title: Cognizant clarifies fresher salary issue, says 'grossly misrepresented'
content: The IT firm faced significant online backlash over the internet for its low fresher salary offering, with many comparing it to 2002 levels

title: Govt likely to extend import regime for laptops, IT hardware products
content: The system kicked in on November 1 to promote domestic manufacturing of these goods and reduce dependence, especially on China

title: IT firm TCS to introduce 'Prime' category as it hits campus trail
content: The need to secure such top talent is also driven by the fast-paced technological changes shaping the sector

title: Top-level exits continue in Wipro as CTO Subha Tatavarti steps down
content: Tatavarti joined Wipro in April 2021 as the technology head under the then-CEO and MD Thierry Delaporte. During her three-year stint, she led Wipro's GenAI initiatives and introduced Wipro ai360

title: FPI buying in Indian IT rises to highest since 2022 in July, shows data
content: Prior to this, the IT sector was divided into software, services and hardware technology

title: Use UPI’s Digital Footprints To Expand Business Prospects: F...
content:
Finance minister Nirmala Sitharaman the crucial role UPI plays in shaping the future of India’s banking sector.
She urged banks to leverage the digital footprints created by UPI to grow their business.
The FM highlighted that India accounts for 45% of all real-time payments globally and asked banks to seize this opportunity.

title: Spacetech Startup GalaxEye Bags INR 17 Cr From Infosys
content:
Infosys said that the investment will be made through the Infosys Innovation Fund, which focuses on collaborating with artificial intelligence and deeptech startups
The investment is part of GalaxEye’s ongoing Series A round. Last month, the startup raised INR 55 Cr from investors including Mela Ventures and Speciale Invest
GalaxEye aims to build the world’s first multi-sensor earth observation satellite, alongside a constellation of indigenous micro-satellites with advanced data fusion capabilities

title: NowPurchase Nets $6 Mn To Offer Tech-Led Procurement Solutio...
content:
SaaS marketplace startup NowPurchase has secured $6 Mn in a mix of equity and debt infusion led by existing investor Info Edge Ventures
The company seeks to deploy the fresh proceeds for expansion and rolling out new solutions to better serve the metal manufacturing industry
As part of its expansion plans, it is looking to enter Punjab, Rajasthan and Tamil Nadu, on the back of growing opportunities in the manufacturing space

title: Vahan Nets $10 Mn To Bolster Its AI Play For Blue-Collar Wor...
content:
Vahan seeks to use the fresh money to develop its AI recruitment technology, which will support eight major Indian languages, including Telugu, Tamil, Kannada, Marathi, Bangla and Gujarati
The company will also use the funds to expand into industries like manufacturing, logistics and retail, with plans to introduce additional services such as loans and upskilling opportunities to enhance blue-collar worker retention
Founded by Madhav Krishna in 2016, Vahan uses AI and WhatsApp’s API to automate the hiring of blue-collar workers

title: Humanoid Robots: The New Frontier For Global Investors
content:
A recent Goldman Sachs’ report predicts the total market for humanoid robots will touch $38 Bn by 2035
Adding just 1.34 robots per 1,000 workers can reduce workplace injuries by 1.2 per worker, highlighting the significant safety benefits of automation
AI-powered robotics are also fueling demand in smart infrastructure and urban development

title: How The Rise Of Family Offices & HNIs Is Boosting Venture Ca...
content:
While the overall population is growing at 2% per annum, HNIs are growing at 16%, and UHNIs are at a double-digit rate
Individual investors and domestic mutual funds (18.8%) own a higher share of India Inc. than FPIs (17.6%)
HNIs and UHNIs have realised that businesses should be one of their investments, not their sole focus

title: CCI Finds Samsung, Xiaomi Flouted Rules For Exclusive Launch...
content:
CCI reports allege smartphone makers colluded with Amazon and Flipkart for exclusive launches
Samsung, Xiaomi, Motorola, Realme, OnePlus named in Amazon report; Vivo and Lenovo added in Flipkart report
Smartphone companies ordered to submit financial statements for FY22-FY24 to CCI

title: Dharaksha Pockets INR 24.8 Cr From Avaana Capital To Build B...
content:
Dharaksha Ecosolutions secures INR 24.8 Cr from Avaana Capital and others to scale up production of biodegradable packaging made from agricultural waste.
The funding aims to bolster R&D and market presence in a burgeoning sector, with the startup already having repurposed 7,000 tons of waste.
The investment reflects rising investor interest in India's sustainable packaging market, highlighted by recent fundings in similar ventures like Bambrew and AmplePac.

title: Yudiz Picks Up 51% Stake In ABCM App To Venture Into Fintech...
content:
Yudiz has picked up a 51.01% stake in ABCM App for INR 6.14 Cr in all-cash deal
By tapping into ABCM App’s fintech solutions, Yudiz aims to build solutions such as AI-driven financial analytics, blockchain-based payment systems and secure digital wallets
Founded in 2019, ABCM App is a SaaS startup specialising in the design and development of financial software and mobile applications

title: TN’s Electronic Manufacturing Push: Apple Supplier Jabil Mul...
content:
This will create 5,000 jobs and create a new cluster for electronics manufacturing, said the Tamil Nadu CM MK Stalin
With Jabil's entry into the state, Tamil Nadu now hosts several major Apple suppliers, including Foxconn, Pegatron, Tata Electronics, and Corning
Jabil, a supplier to Cisco and HP, will establish a major new facility in Trichy, marking one of the first significant investments in the area

title: Swiggy To Increase IPO Size, Eyes INR 5,000 Cr Via Fresh Iss...
content:
Swiggy plans to get shareholders’ nod to raise INR 5,000 Cr (about $600 Mn) through a fresh issue of shares as against INR 3,750 Cr (around $450 Mn) planned earlier
The food tech major will look to get the consent of its shareholders for its revised IPO plans at its extraordinary general meeting on October 3
Swiggy trimmed its consolidated net loss by 44% to INR 2,350 Cr in FY24 from INR 4,179 Cr in the previous fiscal year

title: Honor 200 Lite 5G launched in India with MediaTek Dimensity 6080 chipset: Price, specifications and more
content: The Honor 200 Lite 5G, priced at  ₹17,999, features a 108MP rear camera, 50MP front camera, and a 6.7-inch AMOLED display. It launches in India on September 27, with SBI discounts and early access for Amazon Prime members.

title: iPhone 17 Pro to boast 2nm A19 chip, AI-optimized performance, and 24MP selfie camera: Report
content: Apple's iPhone 17 Pro is anticipated to leverage TSMC's advanced 2nm process, boosting performance significantly. Expected features include 12GB of RAM, a 24MP front camera, and an in-house 5G modem, positioning it as a major upgrade over previous models.

title: Apple rolls out iOS 18.1 Developer Beta 4: Siri gets type-to-text and AI-driven enhancements
content: Apple has launched the fourth developer beta of iOS 18.1, enhancing Siri and introducing features like Type to Siri and call recording for older iPhone models. The update also integrates AI tools for photo editing and writing aids, improving user experience ahead of the public release next month.

title: Flipkart Big Billion Days Sale 2024 announced for September 27: Bank offers, discounts and more
content: Flipkart's Big Billion Days Sale 2024 starts September 27, with early access for Plus members on September 26. The sale will feature discounts on smartphones, electronics, and home appliances, with special offers from HDFC Bank, including cashback and EMI options.

title: Microsoft’s latest 365 Copilot updates bring enhanced AI tools to Excel, PowerPoint, and Teams: All you need to know
content: uhe latest updates to Microsoft's 365 Copilot introduce innovative features like Copilot Pages for collaborative project management and Python integration in Excel. Additional enhancements in PowerPoint, Teams, and Outlook aim to improve user experience and streamline enterprise workflows.

title: Apple's iOS 18 is here, but can your older iPhones keep up with the performance?
content: Apple has released its iOS 18 update, featuring new functionalities. While supporting older models, users may experience performance dips. Recent iPhones should handle the update smoothly, but those with older devices might struggle. For security, users can opt for iOS 17.7 instead.

title: Flipkart Big Billion Days 2024: Massive discounts on Google Pixel 8, Samsung Galaxy S23, and more
content: The Big Billion Days Sale by Flipkart kicks off on September 27, with Plus members getting early access. Major discounts are anticipated on smartphones, including the Google Pixel 8 and Samsung Galaxy S23, along with various banking offers to enhance customer savings.

title: Apple begins to roll out iOS 18 update: How to download, list of eligible devices and what's new
content: Apple has started the global rollout of iOS 18, featuring enhanced customization, an upgraded Siri, and a redesigned Photos app. Users can download it via Settings. It supports a range of iPhone models, including the iPhone 16 series, and offers improvements in Messages and Safari.

title: Samsung eyes 2025 launch for rollable phone with expansive 12.4-inch screen: Report
content: A new Samsung smartphone with a rollable display is expected next year, featuring a flexible 12.4-inch screen and under-display camera. This innovation builds on Samsung's history of foldable devices, aiming to compete with Huawei's recent advancements in smartphone design.

title: Amazon Great Indian Festival 2024 to kick off on September 27: Deals on smartphones, wearables, and more
content: Scheduled for September 27, Amazon's Great Indian Festival Sale 2024 offers early access for Prime members starting September 26. The sale features major discounts on electronics, with highlights including the iPhone 13 potentially priced at  ₹39,999 for SBI card users.

title: Poco India head Himanshu Tandon talks about Poco Pad 5G, upcoming launches, HyperOS on tablets and more
content: Poco India head Himanshu Tandon, in an exclusive interaction with LiveMint, talks about the recently launched Poco Pad 5G, HyperOS on Poco tablets, Poco ecosystem, competition in the tablet segment, and more.

title: OnePlus Nord Buds 3 launched in India with 12.4mm titanium dynamic drivers: Price, specifications and more
content: OnePlus has introduced the Nord Buds 3 in India, featuring 12.4mm dynamic drivers and 36dB ANC. Priced at Rs. 2,299, they offer 43 hours of battery life and are available from September 20 in two colors, with a comfortable in-ear design.

title: Amazon Great Indian Festival 2024: Your guide to winning a free iPhone 15 – everything you need to know
content: Amazon's Great Indian Festival 2024 sale starts on September 27, with Prime members getting early access on September 26. The event promises major discounts on various products and a chance to win an iPhone 15 through a 'Spin & Win' game, with the winner announced on October 1.

title: R Ashwin's Mega Tribute To Jadeja, Pant After Equalling MS Dhoni's Feat
content: R Ashwin showed remarkable control and dominated the Bangladesh bowling in his brilliant 102 not out from 112 balls

title: "From Despair...": Tendulkar, Kumble's Ultimate Tribute To Ashwin, Jadeja
content: R Ashwin and Ravindra Jadeja's rearguard performances salvaged India in the first innings of the first Test against Bangladesh

title: Monaco vs Barcelona UEFA Champions League: When And Where To Watch Live
content: Spanish giants Barcelona travel to the Principality to face AS Monaco in their UEFA Champions League opener at Stade Louis II.

title: Bengal Doctors End Cease-Work, To Resume Essential Services From Saturday
content: The junior doctors of Bengal called off their massive 40-day protest over the rape-murder of a colleague at a Kolkata hospital and said they will join work on Saturday. The announcement came after the state accepted most of their demands.

title: The Only Indian Stay That Made It To "World's Best 50 Hotels"
content: Rajasthan's Sujan Jawai has been named among the world's best fifty hotels. Located in Rajasthan's Pali, an area popular for its leopard sightings, it is the only Indian hotel that made it to the prestigious list.

title: One Nation, One Election Explained: What Is It, How It Will Work
content: The Union Cabinet has cleared the 'one nation, one election' proposal that will eventually see simultaneous voting for state and union governments, as well as urban bodies or panchayats.

title: Anti-Terror Watchdog Praises India, Says Faces Serious Threat From...
content: Terror financing watchdog Financial Action Task Force (FATF) has said India has achieved a high level of technical compliance with its recommendations and taken significant steps to implement measures to tackle illicit finance.

title: Ammunition From India Diverted To Ukraine? What Government Said
content: Dismissing a report by news agency Reuters claiming that ammunition sold by Indian manufacturers has been diverted to Ukraine by European customers, the Ministry of External Affairs has termed it "inaccurate and mischievous".

title: Andhra Government Cites Lab Report In Row Over Animal Fat In Tirupati Laddoos
content: Andhra Pradesh's ruling Telugu Desam Party has attacked rivals YSR Congress over the presence of animal fats in ghee used to make laddoos offered as prasad by the Tirupati Temple.

title: Indian-American CEO Slams Air India For "Worst" Flight, Receives Refund
content: In the video, Mr Patel gave viewers a tour of the subpar amenities, highlighting issues such as loose compartment parts, and torn and damaged surfaces.

title: After EY Employee's Death, Deloitte Ex-Staffer Shares "Tough" Experience
content: Jayesh Jain, from Indore, revealed how overwork impacted both his health and professional life.

title: US Woman Fighting For Life After Vaccine Reaction At Hospital
content: Within ten minutes of receiving the vaccines, Alexis Lorenze experienced symptoms, including temporary blindness, a locked jaw and vomiting.

title: JSW MG Motor India to bring four premium models: This is what we expect
content: MG Motor India is set to unveil four premium electrified models by early 2025, aimed at the accessible luxury segment. These models will be sold exclusively through MG Select, while existing models continue in mainstream channels.

title: MG Windsor EV vs Tata Curvv EV: What to pick between electric CUV & coupe SUV
content: MG Windsor EV comes as the SAIC-owned carmaker's third electric car in India, directly challenging Tata Nexon EV. However, with its aggressive pricing and immediate arrival after the Curvv EV it, challenges the Tata electric coupe SUV as well.

title: Revolt RV1 electric commuter bike launched at ₹84,990. Check details
content: Propelled by a mid-motor and a chain drive system, the Revolt RV1 features two battery options: a 2.2 kWh battery offering a claimed range of 100 km range, and a 3.24 kWh battery with a claimed range of 160 km.

title: Want to buy the new MG Windsor EV? Key facts and features that you should know
content: The Windsor is priced at ₹9.99 lakh and it is the third all-electric offering from the automaker.

title: Trump claims Chinese automakers build factories in Mexico, promises 200% tariffs
content: Trump made false claims about Chinese auto factories in Mexico, threatening significant tariffs on vehicles. He warned a Harris win would decimate the US auto industry, despite recent job growth. Industry analysts clarified that no major Chinese factories are currently being built in Mexico.

title: EV tariffs will damage Germany, China, says Chinese commerce minister
content: The Chinese commerce minister cautioned that EU tariffs on electric vehicles might hurt trade relations with Germany. He called for a timely resolution in accordance with WTO rules, while Germany's minister affirmed support for free trade and cooperation to mitigate trade conflicts.

title: Electric two-wheeler adoption in India on rapid rise, finds study
content: New launches and subsidies are the two power pillars that are propelling electric two-wheeler sales in the country.

title: Brussels Audi Workers Rally Against Potential Plant Closure and Job Cuts
content: Around 200 Audi workers in Brussels are striking amid potential plant closure due to low EV demand and competition from China. With 3,000 jobs at risk, they express frustration over unclear plans and challenges in adapting to electric vehicle production.

title: JSW MG Motor maps out expansion plan with new segment and retail channel
Alia Bhatt reveals what Karan Johar told her when he predicted her match with Ranbir Kapoor: 'I think this is it!'
content: Alia Bhatt revealed on Kapil Sharma's show that Karan Johar played matchmaker for her and Ranbir Kapoor, predicting their connection from the start. Alia’s crush on Ranbir began at nine, and they reunited while filming Brahmastra.

title: Wanted writer Shiraz Ahmed explains why Salman Khan's dialogue 'ek baar jo maine commitment kar di' holds so much importance
content: Marking its 15th anniversary, Prabhu Deva’s 'Wanted' is celebrated for revitalizing Salman Khan's action hero persona. Screenwriter Shiraz Ahmed discusses his collaboration with producer Boney Kapoor and adapting the Tamil hit 'Pokkiri.' He reflects on the creative freedom during production and iconic dialogues that contributed to the film’s monumental success.

title: Patralekhaa refuses to be a part of 'Stree 3': 'Rajkummar Rao and Shraddha Kapoor ki jodi mast hai'
content: Following the success of 'Stree 2', a third installment is confirmed with Rajkummar Rao and Shraddha Kapoor returning. Patralekhaa has chosen not to join, appreciating their on-screen pairing. 'Stree 2' set new box office records. Patralekhaa recently appeared in 'IC 814: The Kandahar Hijack'.

title: Aditi Rao Hydari and Siddharth make first appearance post their wedding; hold hands at Mumbai airport
content: Aditi Rao Hydari and Siddharth married on September 16 at a historic temple in Telangana. Their simple wedding photos went viral online. The couple was spotted at Mumbai airport today, looking stylish. Aditi gained fame from 'Heeramandi,' while Siddharth will feature in 'The Test.' They shared heartfelt captions on social media.

title: New grandparents visit Deepika Padukone and Ranveer Singh's baby daughter at their residence
content: Deepika Padukone was discharged from Mumbai’s HN Reliance hospital on September 15, a week after welcoming her first child, a baby girl, with husband Ranveer Singh. Both mother and daughter are in good health, and the new grandparents, Prakash and Ujjala Padukone, along with Jagjit Singh and Anju Bhavnani, were spotted visiting the couple's residence to meet the newborn.

title: Samantha Ruth Prabhu says 'never stop dreaming' as she gets back on the set of 'Rakt Brahmand'
content: Samantha Ruth Prabhu is back at work and expressed her happiness on Instagram. She is currently filming the OTT series 'Rakt Brahmand', directed by Rahi Anil Barve and created by Raj & DK. The cast includes Aditya Roy Kapur, Wamiqa Gabbi, and Ali Fazal.

title: Urvashi Rautela breaks silence about dating rumours with Rishabh Pant: 'Linking me with RP...'
content: Urvashi Rautela denies dating rumours with cricketer Rishabh Pant, calling them unfounded. She stresses focusing on her career and personal growth amid constant scrutiny. The actress will be seen in upcoming films like 'NBK109', 'Baap', and 'Welcome To The Jungle'.

title: 'Larger Conspiracy At Play': CM Mamata On Bengal Floods, Blames Centre
content: West Bengal CM Mamata Banerjee has accused the Centre of failing to carry out dredging at the Damodar Valley Corporation dams, which released water resulting in floods in several districts of the state

title: ‘They're Celebrating…’: After Pakistan Minister's Article 370 Pitch, PM Modi Hits Out At Congress-NC Alliance
content: Prime Minister Modi warned voters in Reasi against voting for Congress-NC coalition saying that if they are voted to power Jammu and Kashmir will see bloodshed due to terrorism.

title: BJP's Manifesto For Haryana Polls Promises Rs 2,100 Per Month To Women, Govt Jobs For Agniveers
content: Rs 2,100 monthly for women, affordable gas cylinders, and 10 industrial cities are among some of the promises by the BJP for the upcoming Haryana assembly polls.

title: Maharashtra Prepares for Elections With Key Meetings in Mahayuti & MVA to Shape Seat-Sharing Talks
content: As the deadline for finalising agreements approaches, the political temperature in the state continues to rise, with both the MVA and Mahayuti strategising to secure the best possible outcome in the upcoming elections

title: 'One Nation, One Election' Proposal Gets Cabinet’s Clearance, Govt Looks To Build Consensus Before Bringing Bill
content: Government sources said that the Centre is keen to build a consensus before moving the bill in the House. The government is under no pressure to bring ONOP as a bill by winter session itself, sources added

title: Nasa model shows how climate-threatening carbon dioxide moves across India
content: The visualisation, powered by supercomputers, combines billions of data points from ground observations and satellite instruments to create a map over 100 times more detailed than typical weather models.

title: July 21, 2024 shatters all records to become hottest day in Earth's history
content: July 2024 has been characterised by extreme heatwaves across various parts of the world, contributing to this record-breaking day.

title: India walking a tightrope between climate change and development
content: As a developing nation, India faces the dual challenge of mitigating climate impacts and ensuring economic growth, the Economic Survey tabled in Parliament highlighted.

title: Budget 2024: India to boost nuclear energy, develop Bharat Small Reactors
content: In line with India's commitment to sustainable development, the Finance Minister announced plans to formulate regulations for transitioning from energy efficiency targets to emission targets.
